events.name: DAWS - March 2015 Meetup
events.description: Two great talk this month! Panel Beyond skin deep: Don't be fooled by numbers! Colin Ang , Managing Director, Decision Science Agency Numbers can be very confusing. Even for analysts, without understanding some concepts of statistics, we can be easily tricked by numbers. Use these tips to analyse numbers beyond the surface appearance and unlock insights. Collin Ang is the Managing Director of Decision Science Agency, a company focused on helping clients with analytics, customer experience and digital strategy. Collin has a masters degree in statistics and has led analytics teams on both brand side and vendor side. For those particularly keen on analytics this one is for you. Digital Marketing Panel Discussion Topic: The art and science of digital marketing, get your A game on! This month we've changed up the format a little. Each month we get loads of questions on the night, often we can't answer them all. So this month we've decided to take the chains off and let the conversation flow! The second talk on the night will be a panel discussion with 3 digital marketing panelists. This should be a cracker and we strongly encourage all audience members to get involved. On the night we will provide the ability for everyone to ask questions so please come prepared! Speakers: 1. Collin Ang - Managing Director, Decision Science Agency 2. Chris Brinkworth - Regional Director APAC - Ensighten 3. Belle Chua - Analytics Manager - Starhub See you there, DAWS!
events.location: Hood Bar and Cafe @ Bugis+ (formerly Iluma), Bugis+, 201 Victoria Street, #05-07, Singapore 188067

events.name: Creative Coding Meetup - Evening with Mar Canet
events.description: Mar Canet is in town and will be sharing with us some of his experience as an Artist and creative coder. Website: http://www.mcanet.info/blog/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/mcanet Time: 7-9pm (time has been brought forward slightly as Mar has a flight to catch that night) Refreshments are provided so remember to RSVP. Walking Instructions to Zopim: Alight at Commonwealth MRT then walk to Haw Par Technocenter, Lobby B and take the Lift to 7th floor. More about Mar I am artist, researcher who likes to write software exploring new ways of playfulness and expression, inspired in digital age. I am working in computer games, data visualization and new media art installations. I am a co-founder of the art collective Derivart, working in the intersection between finance, art and technology. I am also co-founder of Lummo, a small studio of new media architecture. And I am working as artist-duo with Varvara Guljajeva. If you want to know about which projects I am working now. I am regularly publishing in Facebook and Flickr all new art projects I am currently doing. In addition, I publish regularly videos in Vimeo.
events.location: 401 Commonwealth Drive, Haw Par Technocentre, #07-01, Singapore

events.name: Mar/2015 - Open Space (Improving Team Performance)
events.description: We didn't manage to get a suitable date in Barclays in March so we'll be at IDA Labs! Please do not go to the wrong place. =) The theme for this Open Space is Improving Team Performance and you'll find Farid Baharuddin being the facilitator for the event. Agenda 7:00pm - Food 7:30pm - Generate topics and schedule 8:00pm - Breakout to topic sessions 10:00pm - End We welcome contributions of drinks and snacks! =) What is Open Space? Open Space is a highly collaborative and self-organised meeting where topics are generated on the spot and discussed by the participants through breakout sessions. For more information read Open Space Technology . Getting There Follow this guide for directions to IDA Labs within National Design Centre.
events.location: IDA Labs Level 3 @ National Design Centre, 111 Middle Road, #03-04, 188969, Singapore
